title: We're Doing S'mores
description: Leah, Kate, & Melissa run through a bunch of Court adjacent news-- including this Jane Mayer piece about Ginni Thomas-- before highlighting the big cases to watch in the February sitting.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
